files.patch:
@@ -657,1 +657,1 @@
-  ldr(esp,
+  ldr(rscratch2,
@@ -663,0 +663,2 @@
+    // look for an overflow into the stack reserved zone, i.e.
+    // interpreter_frame_sender_sp <= JavaThread::reserved_stack_activation
@@ -664,1 +666,1 @@
-    cmp(esp, rscratch1);
+    cmp(rscratch2, rscratch1);
@@ -675,0 +677,3 @@
+
+  // restore sender esp
+  mov(esp, rscratch2);
